title: Love, Lust and Lies
description: Love, Lust and Lies is a sexy Desperate Housewives set in San Francisco.  Feisty Gabriella Vitadini is devastated when she discovers that her husband is cheating on her. She fights back against her Italian cultural expectations that, 'she should put up with his affair' by throwing him out.  She shocks her culture to its roots when she has a delicious affair with a younger man who has no idea that she is 11 years older than he is. Gabriella doesn't own up to her age when Dave tells her how good she looks for a woman in her thirties.  The trouble is her young lover wants to marry her and her husband wants her back too. How is she going to deal with the love, lust and lies?
author: Cathleen Ross
